questions.question: What type of engineering services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer complete civil and environmental engineering services: structural design, construction management, urban planning practices, energy audits, APE certifications, photovoltaic system design and technical consulting for tenders.

questions.question: How long does building design take?
questions.answer: Timeframes depend on project complexity. Standard residential design takes 4-8 weeks, while more complex commercial projects may require 2-4 months. We always provide accurate estimates during initial consultation.

questions.question: Do you work throughout the national territory?
questions.answer: Yes, while based in Sicily, we offer our services throughout the national territory. For out-of-region projects, we organize surveys and coordination through qualified local partnerships.

questions.question: How much does a consultation or quote cost?
questions.answer: The first consultation is free and includes a preliminary project assessment. Quotes are provided free of charge within 48 hours of site inspection. Costs vary based on project type and complexity.

questions.question: Do you also handle bureaucratic procedures?
questions.answer: Absolutely yes. We handle all urban planning practices, building permits, construction authorizations and public entity relations. Our service includes complete support from conception to realization.

questions.question: Do you offer energy efficiency services?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in energy audits according to Law 10, APE certifications (Energy Performance Certificate) and photovoltaic system design. We help clients achieve the best energy classes and access state incentives.
